name: The knight adventure (Gino Di Pierro (Space Space Software))
name_original: The knight adventure (Gino Di Pierro (Space Space Software))
description:
You play as a knight in a castle. your objective is to pick up all the coins and reach the green flag over the stairs. there are monsters that will chase you. they can't be destroyed but you can temporary stop them with your sword attack.

Controls:

WASD: move

Space: attack
